author: hotte
message:
I've give yokadi a try and have a question:

How can I print a report of my Todo-Listings?
Or is there a possibility to export in csv/html/pdf?

replies.author: Aur√©lien
replies.message: Yes, you can export to csv, html or xml. To do so, call t_list with "-o file.csv", or "-o file.html" or "-o file.xml".
